company.name: Strategic Gears
company.about:
Strategic Gears is the biggest local management consultancy firm in Saudi Arabia. It has offices in Egypt, Qatar, and the UK. The company provides multidisciplinary services for both the private and public sectors. It offers consulting solutions in the areas of Strategy, Marketing, Organizational Excellence, and Digital and Technology to a range of clients in both the public and private sectors.

The company is heavily involved in the transformation era of Saudi Arabia, driven by the Vision 2030 initiatives. Strategic Gears prides itself on its ability to be a knowledge hub for the Saudi market, publishing reports every month on the current state of the Kingdom’s economy as well as hot topics in both the public and private sectors, including an annual coverage of the Saudi budget, and other reports on the Kingdom’s macroeconomic performance, labour market, digital transformation and AI, among others. The company, which was founded in late 2015, has quickly evolved from a small team to more than 240 employees in all its branches.

evaluations.criterion: Company has announced or completed at least one of the following activities in 2024 or 2025: funding round, hiring initiative, business expansion, partnership, or acquisition
evaluations.reasoning: Strategic Gears has announced multiple partnerships in 2024 and 2025. Specifically, they partnered with IE Business School (as found on Consultancy Middle East) and Nexus FrontierTech (as found on strategicgears.com). Additionally, they forged a partnership with Oxford Business Group in June 2025.
